entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You delivered Imperial security codes provided by a former Imperial officer to the Bothan SpyNet and also used them to recover information from an Imperial command post.
entries.journal_entry_description: The Imperial officer that defected provided the Rebellion with some Imperial security codes for this section of space. You are to travel to Talus and give the Imperial security codes to a Bothan SpyNet operative. After that, you will use the codes to infiltrate an Imperial command post and download all Imperial data stored there.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Travel to Talus and deliver the security codes to an operative of the Bothan SpyNet.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Using the security codes, infiltrate an Imperial command post on Talus and download the information from their database.
entries.task02_start_message: Leia Organa appears from the shadows and approaches you.
entries.task02_utterance_wave_1: Good, you're here. I have an urgent assignment for you.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Travel to Dearic and use the designated communication terminal to signal Leia that you have arrived. Speak with her when she appears. If the transmission fails or if you fail to speak with her before she has to leave, you'll have to travel back to Corellia to speak with Leia.
